activity.title: Examine System Elements for Least Privilege Design and Implementation

description.p: The activity and it steps will be performed by the assessor and facilitated by the IFA GoodRead Owner, ISSO, and Product Team with necessary information and access about least privilege design and implementation of the system's elements: the application, web framework, server, and cloud account infrastructure.

step.title: Obtain Network Access via VPN to IFA GoodRead Environment

description.p: The assessor will obtain network access with appropriately configured VPN account to see staff interface to the application, which is only accessible via VPN.

remarks.p: IFA GoodRead Product Team coordinated with ISSO and IFA Office of Information Technology for assessor's account and VPN client to have access to application.

step.title: Obtain Credentials and Access to AwesomeCloud Account for IFA GoodRead System

remarks.p: IFA GoodRead Product Team coordinated with ISSO and IFA Office of Information Technology for assessor's single sign-on credentials to have access to a read-only assessor role to the AwesomeCloud account for the IFA GoodRead system.

step.title: Obtain Applcation Access Provided by Product Team

description.p: The assessor will obtain non-privileged account credentials to test the IFA GoodRead application as a staff user to create shortlinks.

remarks.p: IFA GoodRead Product Team has configured the application account and credentials sent via encrypted email to assessor.

description.p: This will be the first result once the assessor has completed their final analysis in the assessment.
